verses.name: Exodus 22:24
verses.text: And my wrath shall wax hot, and I will kill you with the sword; and your wives shall be widows, and your children fatherless.

verses.name: Exodus 22:25
verses.text: If thou lend money to any of my people that is poor by thee, thou shalt not be to him as an usurer, neither shalt thou lay upon him usury.

verses.name: Exodus 22:26
verses.text: If thou at all take thy neighbour’s raiment to pledge, thou shalt deliver it unto him by that the sun goeth down:
